lead_paragraph: LeBron James was touched when Tim Duncan, arguably the best power forward in NBA history, pulled him aside following the 2007 NBA Finals.

headline.print_headline: LeBron Scores 28, Passes Duncan in Cavs' 120-103 Win
headline.main: LeBron Scores 28, Passes Duncan in Cavs' 120-103 Win
